name: Airblade (itch)
description:
You are trying to steal the enemy's intel, once you do you have to escape,

an enemy sees you and starts chasing you, so now you have to escape.

Will You Escape?

FEATURES

  • Weapon Shooting
  • Endless Gameplay
  • Enemy Tiles
  • Skydiving Tiles
  • Random Tiles
  • Sliding Tiles
  • Obstacles
